settings.title: When will I get tracking?
settings.text: • We generate tracking as soon as possible. This usually occurs within the first week of ordering. Usually occurs within 3 days. We aim to generate tracking information promptly, typically within the first week of ordering, with most orders being processed within 3 days.

settings.title: what is a thawb?
settings.text: • A thawb is an islamic garment The thawb is traditionally worn by men in Islamic cultures as a symbol of modesty and religious adherence. The thawb is typically a long, loose-fitting garment that covers the body from the neck to the ankles.

settings.title: how long does shipping take?
settings.text: • Most orders deliver within 3 weeks, as most of our products are handmade. Customers can expect timely delivery as our handmade products typically ship within 3 weeks.
